inn1.comm: gentle outswinger starts wide outside off and is left alone
early ripper from Vinay, that has angled into middle, good length, and swerved away to almost shave off stump, squaring up Sibanda, unplayable
wow, this is incalculably daft from Sibanda, he's been so riled up by that jaffa previous ball that he's charged out and had a blind heave, and cover's settled under the total mishit
back of a length, more effort from Vinay, but it heads down leg
short of a length again but much better line on off, played out quietly
leans forward and pushes a pitched up delivery to extra cover, who dives, but the single is taken
fine bounce on this outswinger now, left alone

and he strikes first ball, this is not a Sibanda-level meltdown but Raza's not done much good here, it is a wide outswinger from Shami, Raza's chased it weakly, half-heartedly, and keeper's moved smoothly to his right to accept the second gift of the day
opens up to a length ball on the stumps and carefully plays it out
holding the line, right on off stump, Taylor across on the back foot to block
just short of good length, and he uses the straightish line to earn a single to fine leg
nice, angled in to off, moving away, defended tightly

huge appeal for lbw, this one has come in and Masakadza is pinned on the crease, the ball has run through the slip cordon, could be height, could be marginally outside the line, need replays, hit him in line, but a bit too high
now Taylor is hit on the pad, but this is quite high
Zimbabwe will need lot more of this, Vinay overpitches as he angles it away from close to the stumps, Taylor leans into it and puts it away past mid off
another appeal for lbw, Zimbabwe can't put bat to ball at the moment, but again this has pitched short of driving length and hit him right at the top of the flap
outside off with the away swinger, not much shape, left alone
another good length ball outside off, he lets it go
wide outswinger now, moves away a lot and starts too far
just outside off, a length ball holds its line, Masakadza is right forward to defend
nice shape, angled in to off and straightening, would like to be a touch fuller, defended
lots of bounce and movement this time, and Masakadza chases the outswinger, lucky to not do a Raza,
this is too wide and shortish too, Masakadza puts it away through covers
stretches forward outside off and defends with a thick inside edge
lovely line, straightening just outside off stump, good length, Taylor opens up and defends
good length ball, bounces and moves away a shade, is left alone
goes for a full delivery on the stumps, ends up sending it towards the pads, but Masakadza whips it straight to forward square leg
nearly another one, he's gone after a wide outswinger, and missed it by a long margin
a lot closer to off stump from Vinay, left alone this time
there is no mid off, and Vinay has overpitched, Masakadza has driven it hard through that region
there is mid off now, but Vinay has overpitched once more, the outswinger has had little chance to move away much before Masakadza has forcefully driven it past the fielder's dive
on the pad and Taylor stabs it behind square leg
too good, angled in, pitched just outside off and kicked past the outside edge
this one is on middle and straightening again, Masakadza checks the drive down the pitch
India are conceding runs through vacant mid off, this is just a push but extra cover has a lot of chasing to do
into the pads to Taylor once again, but midwicket dives and keeps him to one
pitches it up, it swerves away, but has started too far outside off
plays out a short of a length ball to point from the crease
happy to stay back to a good length ball on off and defends
now he comes forward to a pitched up delivery just outside off and blocks solidly
Taylor awkwardly pushes and survives, Jadeja fires in the throw from point and had he hit at the non-striker's end, Taylor's dive would have been in vain
a bouncer now, well targetted, a surprised Masakadza weaves inside the line
pushes a length ball away solidly
again Shami is towards Taylor's pads, there is a direct hit at the non-striker's from midwicket with Masakadza in, and they run for the ricochet
bouncer, not much bite, outside off, left alone
the initial zip is slowly going away now, Taylor is able to punch a good length outswinger without worry
once more, Shami sends it in towards the pads, and this time there is a lot of angle on it, DK has to dive and does well
jumps across and pushes a length ball to mid on off the back foot
holding the line on off stump, good length, Taylor plays it out to mid on
widish length ball but Taylor mistimes the punch to short cover
digs it in short, it rises harmlessly as batsman ducks
a shout for lbw as Masakadza is surprised by a length ball that skids in, but this was headed down leg
late in coming forward to this pitched up delivery and can't find any power on the drive
good length, moving away outside off, Taylor is happy to punch it from the crease
Vinay bowls it short outside off, and Taylor jumps at the opportunity, pulling it flat through square leg off the front foot
he pitches one up on driving length, and almost has Taylor in trouble, a mistimed drive loops in the air but falls short of mid off,
good length delivery around off, pushed away, these two settling in now
good length again, pushed to point off the front foot
this is good length too, and is solidly punched to mid off
Shami is pitching everything on a good length, this moves away to give him slight width, and Masakadza forces it past cover
they are not having any problems in playing length deliveries, Taylor comes across and pushes down the track
short of driving length once more, and punched back to the bowler
starts back of a length across the right-hander who seems surprised as he pulls bat away late
tries to force a shortish one away, mishits to the bowler
shot, he;s used the angle across him on this good length ball to smack it between cover and point
more runs, this one is wider and Masakadza powers it through the off side, but Kohli has put a deep point in place now
into the pads and is lucky to get away as Taylor misses the fine nudge

Taylor survives another run out chance, jumps across and drops this onto the crease and goes for the single, he was on the back foot and takes a lot of time to get momentum, there is a direct hit but he's made it
innocuous length ball pitching wide outside off and moving in, played out towards midwicket
he's tried a big sweep from way outside off stump, and has missed
this holds the line outside off, Taylor reaches out and guides it behind point
another tight single, wide of mid off this time, throw misses at the non-striker's end
angled in towards the pad, and Taylor uses that to nudge it wide of short fine leg
punched for a single to mid on
tries a sweep off middle stump first ball, it goes to short fine
another sweep, from outside off now, to deep square leg
dropped, Kohli dives and puts down a sharp chance to his left at short extra cover, Masakadza had powered a drive off the front foot
nice, skips down the track and chips this over mid on
Masakadza taking on Jadeja, slog-sweeps over midwicket, hasn't got hold of it, and it plonks down into the outfield
pitches it up and beats Taylor on the drive first ball from this end
pitched up on off now, Taylor stretches forward, bat nicely in front of pad, and pushes to midwicket
tight line, close to off and leaving him with the angle, left alone
lunges forward and nudges this in front of square leg, there is no one there and they think of two, but midwicket reaches there in time
hit high on the pad as he comes forward
shuffles outside off and drops a back of a length ball towards covers
goes back to a tossed up ball, it spins away sharply and he abandons the cut late
flatter and cut to point
fuller, pushed back to the bowler
shortish and Masakadza is ready with a big pull over midwicket
comes forward and drives a tossed up ball to the sweeper
quicker, defended off the front foot
this started across, but held its line, Masakadza is watching them very closely now and let it go safely
had to play at this pitched up delivery, a slower one too, on off stump, but even as he came forward he did not stab hard at it, and a thick edge bounced wide of slip

Taylor is doing a Kohli here, standing his ground after a catch has been taken, at mid off, he wanted to loft a pitched up delivery over the man, but could not time it, Shami has made good ground to his left and seems to have at least a couple of fingers under the ball as he dives, Taylor has to walk back after the third umpire has had a look at replays, he does, without asking for another look from the officials
nice delivery, away swinger pitched up outside off, left alone late
super start against the left hander for Unadkat, fullish into the batsman and holding the line, Williams prods and is beaten
still fuller, right on off this time, defended
tossed up and beats the forward push outside off
goes back to a length ball, it bounces and he is surprised, manages to push it away
pushed off the front foot to point
into middle with the angle, full too, he whips it down to long on
spins in to off stump and Williams awkwarwdly nudges it behind square on leg
swats a fullish delivery off the back foot to short cover
fullish from Unadkat close to off stump, it holds the line and is defended
big swing, superb length, tight line, everything happening for Unadkat, Williams lets it go
goes short now and Williams short-arm swats it behind square leg
short of a length now, into middle, jabbed to square leg
overpitched now, into the pads, and Williams has wristily worked it past square leg, it is stopped just inside the rope
short of a good length, forced to short cover
straightens gently on middle, he has time to punch it off the back foot to long on
tosses it up, he goes back  and works it to midwicket
big shout for lbw, Masakadza has missed off the back foot, but is saved as this was headed just down leg
spins down the pad and is worked square
pushed softly to extra cover
Raina dives, but cannot stop the pushed single to long off
pitched outside off, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up around middle, ball loops back to the bowler, falling short
short outside off, cut away to third man for a single

and Mishra strikes in his first over! Short of length this time outside off, Masakadza cuts on the back foot and edges it to the keeper. Zimbabwe's top four are back to the pavilion within the first 20 overs

two in two for Mishra! Waller goes for a golden duck. Mishra pitched it up and this one came in. Waller was way inside the crease and missed it completely, the ball hit him right in front of middle and leg
another googly from Mishra. Pitched it outside off and Chigumbura safely defended it off the back foot. There were four close in fielders around the batsmen
pitched it fullish around off, pushed to long on for a single
straight and full on middle, driven to long off for a single
straight again and pushed down the ground for a single
slightly outside off, defended for a dot ball
outside off and driven to deep cover for a single
angled into the batsman around middle, pushed to long on for a single
pitches it on leg stump without much turn, hits the pads
around middle this time, pushed back to the bowler
short and outside off, cut to sweeper cover for two quick runs
on leg stump, worked towards square leg for a comfortable single
tossed up outside off, driven with soft hands to short third man
shorter and flatter outside off, guided square of short third man for a single
flat and short outside off, beats the batsman outside off
and he's been given! Jadeja pitched it up around middle this time, angling into the batsman who missed it. It's a close call and might have missed the leg stump because of the angle
full outside off, defended on the front foot
another one full and on off, defended safely
shorter this time and turns a bit to trouble the batsman who defends it again
gives more room outside off, Utseya tries to cut without much footwork but the turn beats him
full outside off, driven to mid-off
full and on off, tried to push on the front off, the turn takes an inside edge to midwicket
short and slightly wide, cut away on the off side but overthrows make it three for Williams
pitched outside off, but he has overstepped
full and on middle, tried to swing over the on side but missed it
full and pushed back down the ground
shorter and outside off, cut away comfortably for a single to third man
full on off and middle, pushed back to the bowler
shorter with the same line, defended on the back foot
full and straight, defended on the front foot
shortish outside off, cut to short third man
full and on off, driven but another dot ball
pitches it on the leg stump and defended safely, it's a maiden from Jadeja
round the wicket, flat and outside off, Willams tries to cut but misses this one which goes straight
flighted outside off, takes a thick edge to short third man
another no ball from Mishra, was pitched up and driven down the ground
Williams shuffles across and scoops it fine for three runs, well placed by the batsman
pitched up and slightly flighted, defended safely
flighted on off, driven straight to cover
shorter and on middle, this googly takes a thick inside edge and gives Utseya a single on the on side
flighted it outside off and gave him room, Utseya drove it handsomely for a boundary
shorter and on middle, Utseya jabs it towards point and the two steal a quick single
full and on middle, Williams slog sweeps it from the middle of the bat over the square-leg boundary for a six!
fuller this time and pushed back to the bowler
flatter outside off, Williams tried to cut but didn't time it properly
good length on middle, this one turns a but and takes an inside edge to go to fine leg for a couple
full and on middle, defended safely by Utseya
flighted outside off, it turns and Utseya works it towards cover
full and straight, defended back
full again, Utseya tries to go over the top but drives it to mid-on
short and on middle, Utseya goes to the back foot and pushed it wide of cover for a single
full and middle, driven to long-on for a single
flat and on off and middle, pushed down the ground to long-on for a single
short and straight, Utseya tried to pull but fails to time it properly
full and outside off, driven to cover for a single
full and around off, Williams turns his wrists to work it on the on side for a single
short and outside off, worked to point
full and on the stumps, defended safely on the front foot
straight and slight short, pushed back tot he bowler
outside off and full, pushed back again
full on the pads, Williams tries to slog it but misses
full and on off, driven to cover for a dot
slightly short and outside off, Williams goes back and cuts it to deep cover for a single
flighted outside off on good length, Utseya tries to defend but misses it
flighted down leg, Willaims gets an edge trying to sweep it
on middle and leg, Willaims tries to work it on on side but misses
full and on middle, defended safely
pitched up on middle and off, Williams reverse sweeps it wide of short third man and gets a boundary
full on the pads, worked away square of the wicket with the wrists for a single
full and on off, defended safely on the front foot
good length and angling in, Williams defends it inside the crease
short and outside off, Williams cuts it towards deep cover for a single
good length ball on off and angling away, left alone
short and angling away again, left alone easily
round the wicket this time, left alone as it was well outside off
closer to the stumps and slightly short, Utseya opens the face of the bat to guide it to third man for single
straight and outside off on good length, left alone
slightly short and outside off, moves away and Utseya fails to connect this time, hardly any footwork from him
closer to the stumps on good length, worked to point for a dot ball

the bowling change works for India as Shami strikes! It was a good length ball outside off and moved away from the batsman who poked without much footwork and edged it to Karthik who took it easily. Second wicket for Shami
full and outside off, left alone easily
good length ball outside off, Chatara pokes to third man for a single, but Jadeja's wayward throw gives Chatara overthrows and four runs in all
good lenght ball on the stump, pushed back to the bowler
angled in after pitching on off, worked on the on side for a single off the back foot
full and outside off, Chatara tries to drive and misses it. A stifled appeal from the fielders doesn't disturb the umpire
good length on off and angling away, Chatara tries to poke but misses it
round the wicket and full outside off, Chatara tries to poke and misses it yet again

Chatara was almost run out there! he pushed a full length ball back past the bowler but Williams didn't respond for a single and Chatara was halfway down the pitch but made it back in time by the time mid-off pikced it up, turned around and threw it to the keeper
full and on middle, worked off the pads towards square leg for a couple
bouncer this time and Williams lets it go to the keeper. that's the first for the over

Williams is runout this time! It was pitched short of length on leg stump, Williams played it off his hips and called for two straight away. But it was Jadeja's arm he was challenging. It was a flat throw from square leg and Williams hardly waited for the red light there
round the stumps and good length ball on off, defended in the crease
full and on the leg stump, Vitori fails to play it off his hips
short and down the leg side, Vitori let it go but it's not been given a wide
full and outside off, slight turn takes an edge towards short third man
full and on the middle stump, driven on the on side for a single
googly this time, pitched outside off and Vitori's bat was some distance from the ball
Vitori has launched it over long-off for six! It was full and he swung his arms to make it cross the boundary
full again, Vitori punches it down the ground for a single
full and on off stump, the googly is pushed back to the bowler
short of length outside off, cut to short third man
fuller and on off, defended back
darts it down the leg side for a wide
wide again, similar delivery and Karthik does well to catch it
fullish outside off, defended back
short and straight, Vitori goes back and defends it
full outside off and Vitori tried it launch it over on the on side. it bounced in the crease and went to mid-on. the fielders appealed but umpire turned it down
down the leg side for another wide
outside off and worked to short third man
short of length on leg stump, worked on the on side for a single
round the wicket and pitches it on good length outside off, Vitori misses it completely
very short and outside off, the ball jumps up and Vitori defends it on the back foot
this one was on good length but putside off to give Vitori room outside off to swing his arms and it went past point for a four
full and on off, defended safely on the back foot
short and angling in form off, Vitori tries to pull and fails to connect
tossed up outside off, worked towards short third man for a single
short and flat outside off from round the wicket, Vitori misses it
flat outside off and left alone this time
outside off again, Vitori tries to cut but misses it this time
another flat and short outside off, Vitori misses again
slightly flighted with the same angle, Vitori tries to defend and the ball hits his pads
short of length and straight outside off, Chatara tries to edge it to third man but doesn't connect
shorter and outside off, almost a bouncer, Chatara slashes hard at it but misses again
closer to the stumps and fuller, Chatara defends but it takes an inside edge and hits his body
Chatara connects finally and how! It's a bouncer this time and Chatara pulls it in style over square leg boundary for a six
fuller outside off, defended safely towards cover
slightly short of length on off and coming in, Chatara covers his stumps and defends
short of length outside off, Vitori guides it to third man for a single
round the wicket to Chatara on the stumps, defended easily
short and outside off, this one angled in towards Chatara who fails to connect
bouncer on middle and leg and Chatara lets it go through
full and outside off, Chatara opens his arms and dispatches it over mid-on for a four. Zimbabwe are collecting crucial runs here from their tail
full and straight, defended safely by Chatara by covering his stumps
full and outside off, Vitori slog sweeps it over the square leg boundary down on one knee
outside off and cut to short third man for a single
flighted on middle and leg, driven to midwicket
on leg stump again, Chatara fails to hit it past midwicket
on off this time, struck back to long-on for a single
the googly has done it for Mishra. Over the wicket, he pitched it just around off and it turned enough to take Vitori's outside edge and land into Karthik's gloves. That was Mishra's third wicket
good length outside off, Chatara guides it to point
full and outside off, Chatara drives it towards point who avoids a single
outside off again, Chatara tries to push it back but misses
good length ball on off and coming in, Chatara defends it carefully
bouncer on middle stump, Chatara lets it go
fuller and on off, Chatara charges down and launches it to the cow corner for a four
this google missed everyone! pitched it outside off and cmae back in sharply to go through the gate and struck Karthik on his chest
flighted well outside off, Chinouya edges it past second slip for a couple
full on the leg stump, defended on the on side
outside off and full, pushed towards cover
straight and full, defended back to the bowler
Mishra tosses it way outside off and Chinouya drives it handsomely through the covers for a four
full and on off, defended back to the bowler
short of length and outside off, goes further away as Chatara tries to poke at it and misses
short of length outside off, Chatara tries to push it back but misses again
full on the pads, Chatara works it to square leg but can't get it past him
bouncer on middle stump, Chatara pulls it for a single
good length ball outside off, missed by Chinouya who tried to defend it
down the leg side and Chatara lets it go all the way to the boundary, five wides for Zimbabwe
outside off and full, Chatara tries to slog by clearing his leg but misses
full and straight, defended back to the bowler
shorter and straight, Chatara goes back and defends on the back foot
full and on on off and middle, defended easily
that's a quicker one outside off and Chatara misses it
the googly does it again for Mishra! it was pitched outside off, Chatara came forward and tried to drive it but missed it completely and the ball turned and crashed into the stumps

inn2.comm: pitched up to the stumps right away, Rohit stretches forward, bat in front of pad, and defends
back of a length, Rohit stays in the crease and runs it to point
good one, sharp carry from back of a length, also held its line outside off as Rohit shouldered arms
pushes it too far across with the angle
Rohit crouches as he pushes this length ball off the front foot, indicating it kept a tad lower than he expected
cut off the front foot but finds backward point
full into the pads, Rohit works to square leg, who half-stops it with a dive
sharp first delivery in international cricket for Chinouya, skids on from a good length at the left-hander, nudged square
nice, he pitches it up this time, angles it across and Dhawan holds bat within the pad, working up some pace already
sends it into the pads, Dhawan whips it past square leg
hangs bat inside the line again as Chinouya gets it to lift outside off
and again, just outside off stump, short of driving length, moves away further after pitching, Dhawan pulls the bat inside
overpitches it this time, and Dhawan places it between extra cover and mid off, who chases it all the way, and pulls it back just inside with a slide
just past a diving second slip, Vitori got Dhawan pushing from the crease at this full delivery, slight away shape took a thick edge, but Dhawan is lucky
defended off the front foot
he is getting sharp carry from around a good length, this also straightens after being angled in, Dhawan lets it go
thought of going after this shortish delivery, but it held its line outside off and he adjusted to play it out to point
sharp, sharp bouncer, what an accurate and quick short ball this is, it kept on coming in at Dhawan, who abandoned all thoughts of a stroke and ducked just in time. Lost his balance, but survived
straightening outside off, good length, Dhawan is not in the mood for attacking it
Chinouya gets it to jag in to Rohit from back of a length, and the batsman is hit on the thigh pad
slightly fuller, moving in again, Rohit stays on the crease and defends
pitches it up, Rohit is right forward to smother it
lovely shot, Rohit's stepped out to this length delivery and drilled it clean over extra cover
some comeback from the bowler, angles it in good length, Rohit plays for it, but the ball just about holds the line and zips past
full into the pads now, turned to fine leg
puts front foot across, brings bat around and nudges a length ball to leg for one
angles it into the pad, it skids on, Dhawan gets bat down in time to flick it to fine leg
coming forward early and pushing a full delivery to mid off
he is getting that front leg far across now, but is able to bring an angled bat down on the length delivery and clip it past midwicket
short of a length, on off, can't work it far away from the pitch
Vitori digs in the short ball, into the batsman, but Rohit is ready, smacking a meaty pull off the front foot through square leg
opens the face and runs it past second slip to third man
he is getting it to jag in and bounce from just short of a length, Chinouya, Rohit is hit on the body
hurls this fuller and down leg now
stays around the crease and punches a good length delivery, can;t beat extra cover
finds bounce outside off, Rohit adjusta as he punches to point
Rohit has fallen to the debutant, another failure for him this series, stepped out to a widish length delivery that moved away further, he chased and edged it behind, Chinouya is delighted
Chinouya is working up good pace, now Kohli is surprised first ball with one that hurries in from back of a length and is hit
defended off the front foot
opens the face as he comes forward and guides a length delivery, point dives full-length and keeps them to one
back of a length, on off, pushed to extra cover
short down the leg side, Kohli swivels and pulls hard, but there is fine leg in place
full into the pads to Dhawan now, and he picks up easy runs, whipping high in the air over square leg
bouncer, Dhawan is ready with the pull, and the ball has raced past square leg
and again, Chinouya has Kohli in trouble, jags in a long way, bounces, and smashes into the chest, Kohli manages a smile
poor follow-up, sprays it way outside off stump
pitched up to off stump, Kohli solid in pushing it to mid on
moves across, gets right behind the line of a length ball angled in to off, and blocks
just short of a length, Kohli is solid in defending off the back foot
turns it to the leg side with the inward angle, but midwicket is around
superb over, tight line just outside off, just short of driving length, bouncing, Kohli sizes it up and blocks calmly
short of a length, skids on, Dhawan gets a thick edge away to third man for a single
this was shortish and moving down leg too, but Kohli has created so much pace on the whip, no chance for fine leg as it crashes into the deep backward square leg rope
nice delivery, angled in and just about holds the line outside off, Kohli is moving across and pulls bat out of the way
angles it in again, this time Kohli misses, and the ball carries along down leg
down to third man for one
short and wide this time, messes up as the strike changes, Dhawan cracks a powerful cut through cover
this was on the pads now, over correcting the line, but escapes as Dhawan cannot time it past short fine
right forward, head on top, solid defence, all that
Chinouya has been steaming in at Kohli, this time he offers him slight width, it is not short at all, but Kohli has created more room to  carve it past cover
played out to midwicket
pitched up, Chinouya has impressed with his zip and control, Kohli plays it to cover
pushed to extra cover
short of a length, around off, Kohli works it, straight to square leg
nippy length ball, but on the pad, worked away to deep square
solid push to mid off
this is uppish as Kohli guides a back of a length delivery, but he;s also placed it past point, third man keeps them to just one
Dhawan is hurried into the pull, but he's got lots of bat on it, over midwicket, but it slows down near the rope and Waller runs across from deep square to stop it with a slide

a mix-up, Dhawan pushed in front of extra cover, ran almost half way and stopped as he saw the fielder get to the ball, but he only got there, could not pick it up cleanly, and they are able to cross over
works a full one to midwicket
down the leg side first up, Dhawan is happy to put it away with a crisp sweep behind square
punched down to long off
goes back and pushes with the slight turn to long on
starts way outside leg and spins in, pushed to midwicket
nice, hurries across with some extra turn, Dhawan is opening up in the crease and it is beaten
straight to short fine leg
a thick leading edge to third man as Kohli tried to work it to the leg side, it held its line a tad, producing the edge
straightish outside off, left alone
sharp, skiddy length delivery angled in to off, he stays in the crease and chops to point
moves across, brings bat around front pad and works from middle to square leg
good length, worked wide of forward square leg for a single
there for the drive with the angle taking it outside off, but Dhawan goes too eagerly at it and mistimes to extra cover
worked off the back foot to square leg
works it past square leg this time for one
pitches outside leg and turns across, Dhawan makes somr room and punches down to long off
leans forward and works it straight to midwicket
comes forward and finds midwicket once more
looks to defend off the front foot but is hit high on the pad
Dhawan has smoked this length delivery off the front foot, but he's also opened the face and picked out shortish cover, hit it straight to him, Sibanda hangs on to the screamer
hurries on from a good length, just outside off, he moves across and stabs it away
angled in, moves further inwards after pitching good length, but starts too far outside off
short of a length, fine carry, left alone
he has been leaving them outside off, but he has to play now, Chaara pitches it right on off, but Rayudu is stretching forward to block
defended from the crease
has him driving with a flighted ball, and a thick edge races along the ground towards the third man rope before it is pulled back
worked to square leg
Rayudu did not have much clue about this one, came forward to defend but it spun in sharply and hit him on the pad, going down
goes deep in the crease and works behind square
flighted full just outside off, he reaches forward and whips it back
right on target, pitches it up on off stump after drinks, Rayudu crouches forward to block
he wanted to pull, on one leg, but gets a thick inside edge to pad, and the ball rolls onto the crease, Rayudu wanted a single, but slip had already run up
down the pads, rolls away to fine leg
again pitched up to the pads, Kohli works it square easily
is late in coming forward to drive this pitched up ball and mistimes it weakly to cover
good length around off, pushed away
moves forward and pushes a tossed up ball to the bowler
stays half forward and pushes to the off side
leans forward and wristily turns it down to fine leg
that nearly took the off stump, Rayudu pushes forward to a flighted ball, it barely turns and beats the outside edge, was also very close to off stump
pushed to midwicket
moves well forward and pushes solidly but can't get off strike, mid off is in the way
nice, angled in, just short of driving length, Rayudu pokes inside the line
opens the face and awkwardly runs a length delivery to point
Kohli is running to the danger end after Rayudu nudges close to the pitch, but the captain's quick and square leg, running in, has also failed to pick up the ball
chopped behind point
smoothly forward and blocks a pitched up ball on off
opens up and defends from the crease
goes back to a flighted delivery and mistimes a punch wide of point
leans forward and swats a full delivery past midwicket to wide long on
goes deep in the crease and works it to deep midwicket
opens up, goes back and whips from middle stump to deep midwicket
defends a tossed up ball, not stretching too far forward
into middle stump, Kohli uses the angle and picks up one more to fine leg
awkward again as he works a short of a length ball to the right of mid on, has to hurry as the throw comes in
opens the face as he defends, to point
comes forward, opens the face and finds point once more
finds the gap at cover this time with a push to a good length ball, sweeper fields
gets some width and steers it past point, third man runs around
steps out and works it to long on
steps out, and drives with an open face , but picks out extra cover
goes back and punches to long off
some turn, but into the pads, and he's picked behind square for one
wants to cut, backs away and goes hard at it even as it bounces extra, a thick edge flies past slip
moves across to a flighted ball on middle and leg and works it behind square
starts with the customary angle into the right-hander, but overcooks it, way down leg
a punch to a short of a length ball, but mid on cuts it off
short and wide, Rayudu attacks it, but he hasn't timed it, and it rolls to sweeper cover
shot, things had gone quiet, but Kohli brightens up with a dismissive pull, taking it from way outside off and splitting the gap between midwicket and mid on
this was full and rolled onto the crease as Kohli pushed forward, Rayudu was quick to run up and beat the bowler's kick onto the stumps
Rayudu gets one away now, it is pitched up and he's lofted it cleanly over mid on
steered to third man for one
goes back and steers from off but finds point
tossed up on off stump, he is deep in the crease and blocks uncertainly
spins into the pads and he picks up a single to deep square
whipped off the pad but square leg dives to stop it
pushed front foot out and appeared to step out before pushing softly to point
walks out and clips it away but cannot beat forward square leg again
Rayudu is struggling far too often with routine deliveries like these, a full delivery on the pad, but he misses
attacks a widish pitched up ball but mistimes it to mid off
tries to loft straight but again does not time it, it rolls down to long on
Kohli wants to go after this length ball but his punch is straight to mid off
superb placement from Kohli as he leans into this drive, sweeper cover has to do lots of running but he gets around
beaten, wanted to run this widish back of a length ball to third man
pushed off the back foot to midwicket
on the back foot again but works it straight to midwicket
turns it off the pad and beats midwicket's dive this time
rocks back but is hurried into the pull and cannot beat midwicket
worked to square leg
this time Kohli has slight width outside off, and immediately he goes back and punches it through the covers
nice, Rayudu times this front-foot drive now through the covers but the sweeper is in place

Kohli fairly pounds this widish length ball through point, the sweeper gets around, Kohli is half way up for the second, Rayudu is not coming back, Kohli gets back in time, and puts on an angry glare, and walks up to speak to Rayudu
bounces from back of a length but also goes down leg
comes across and defends a good length ball
he's giving these widish ones a hammering, but the sweeper is keeping the impact to singls
wide again from Chigumbura, Rayudu with a cut now, and another single to the sweeper
tossed up on the pads, nudged to short fine
walks out and clips it out to deep midwicket, this time they will take two and there will be no glaring
goes back and works it square with the slight spin
pushed to deep midwicket
in the air for a while as he punches off the back foot, but far short of midwicket
gets bat around pad to work to square leg
right forward to defend a good length ball on off
length on the pad, worked square softly and they come back for the second
tries to whack a pull but this is not short enough and he mishits to mid on
leans forward into a pitched up ball but cannot beat mid off
ending on off stump, Kohl across to block
pitched up delivery pushed straight to mid off
a tossed up ball on the pad, worked square
whips crisply but mid on runs across and dives to stop it
picked from middle and turned square, fielder runs after it and slides
goes deep in the crease and whips out to deep midwicket
half forward to defend a flighted ball
off and middle line, Rayudu punches it to deep midwicket
and Rayudu has chipped this pitched up delivery straight to the bowler, had started to make up for all the initial struggle, but leaned at this one without moving the feet and Vitori clung on
and who would have thought, it is a short ball first up to Raina, he pulls it from outside off behind square leg
short again, this time into the batsman, Raina checks the pull into the ground through square leg
walks across and nudges it square off the pad
punches a length ball to the bowler
pitches it up this time, Kohli is forward, pushing with bat in front of pad to defend
short of a length but leg-sidish and its turned in front of square, Raina has to hurry back for the second but is safe
gets across and pushes a short of a length ball to extra cover
steps across and opens the face but backward point dives to stop it
that is pitched up and sharp, Raina gets a leading edge through cover as he wants to go leg side
Kohli's on the front foot and has pulled high in the air, deep midwicket is a few yards in, though, and what could have been a chance for a man on the rope has safely sailed over him
shot, he's walked out and slammed this to mid off, so hard it';s burst out of the fielder's hands
steps across to off and pushes to covers
nice, he's remained in the crease to a short of a length ball and dabbed it to third man
Raina targets midwicket, front foot across and picks it from off stump high over midwicket, it rolls over into the boundary
Vitori tries the yorker, it is right on the stumps, but Raina has moved across and managed to get some bat on it, just in time
a high full toss into the body, Raina manages to nudge it square, exchanges friendly pats on the back with the bowler as he trots to the other end
leans forward and turns a pitched up ball off the pad to deep square leg, Zimbabwe have bowled too often in that area today
Kohli reaches one more ODI fifty with a superbly-placed drive off the front foot, splits the gap between mid off and extra cover
turned to midwicket with the inward angle
pushes a back of a length ball down the track
his front leg is way across and this ball is full and angled into the stumps, but he has no trouble in bringing bat around and tucking it square
Chinouya has been the quickest and sharpest of the Zim bowlers today, he bothered Kohli initially, but now the captain charges out and lofts him cleanly over wide long off, super timing once more
angled in, worked to fine leg
this is not that short really, but Kohli is in the mood to end matters now, whacks it over midwicket dismissively
walks out, but it is too full and he ends up toe-ending it through extra cover
leans forward outside off stump but gets too close to the pitch and digs it back to the bowler, some late inswing there for Vitori
a low full toss down the pad, and Raina gets enough on it, wide of short fine
full toss again, a high one this time, Raina swats it through square leg, there is a man in the deep
backs away to leg, bowler follows him, Kohli works it behind square
short, too short, well outside off, Kohli pulls bat away
swats a shortish one off the pad behind square leg, fielder runs around quickly and keeps them to one
that shall do it, Raina receives the last gift for today on the pad, works it wide of fine leg, who cannot stop it and India have won the series before heading to Bulawayo
